Generation VIII.Sword: It's capable of flying faster than 120 mph . It battles alongside Dreepy and dotes on them until they successfully evolve.
Generation VIII.Shield: Without a Dreepy to place on its head and care for, it gets so uneasy it'll try to substitute any Pokémon it finds for the missing Dreepy.

Generation IX.Scarlet: This Pokémon flies around at over 120 miles per hour . If a Drakloak is defeated in a battle, its Dreepy will wander off without a second thought.
Generation IX.Violet: This Pokémon stores up energy in its lungs, then shoots it out. It takes care of Dreepy and battles alongside them until they're all grown up.

Generation VIII.Sword: Lake of Outrage Axew's Eye , Rolling Fields ( Max Raid Battle )
Generation VIII.Shield: Lake of Outrage Axew's Eye , Rolling Fields ( Max Raid Battle )
Generation VIII.Expansion Pass: Old Cemetery Slippery Slope , Old Cemetery , Giant's Foot , Frigid Sea , Ballimere Lake ( Max Raid Battle ) Max Lair ( Dynamax Adventure )
